revised_title: Osmotic and Ionic Regulation in Antarctic Ecosystem: A Study on Branchinecta gaini
tldr: This study examines the osmotic and ionic regulation of the crustacean Branchinecta gaini found in Antarctic freshwater habitats. The research shows that the animal has typical freshwater adaptations and no special features related to its Antarctic environment. The findings contribute to our understanding of the unique Antarctic ecosystem and the survival strategies of its inhabitants.
